tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE financial_reports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    revenue_id INT REFERENCES revenue(id),
    expenses_id INT REFERENCES expenses(id),
    budget_id INT REFERENCES budget_allocations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE financial_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR,
    revenue_amount DECIMAL,
    expenses_amount DECIMAL,
    budget_amount DECIMAL,
    report_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    revenue_variance DECIMAL,
    expenses_variance DECIMAL,
    budget_variance DECIMAL,
    analysis_date DATE
);
